name: Mel's Apothecary (WIP)
description:
Forage ingredients (don't forget you basket!), and brew health potions to sell them to battle-weary adventurers.

This is a work-in-progress, just a demo. Some things I hope to include in the final version:

  • A little town market to spend your hard-earned coins at
  • Unlock recipes by purchasing books
  • Buyable furniture- extra shelves, cauldrons, and potted plants
  • Small bits of dialogue between Mel and her customers
  • More map areas to explore
  • SFX/music
  • Title screen

Thanks for playing!
